attributes.action: Force facebook to stop discrimination of St George's flag
attributes.additional_details: Because it is pure discrimination against british public showing patriotism in sharing the flag on there page
attributes.background: Would like government to challenge facebook on its stance for banning uk citizens from using St George's flag on facebook posts

rejection.details:
How social media companies such as Facebook check posts on their platforms is a matter for them, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

In any case, Facebook has apologised for what it says was a mistake in blocking certain images showing the St George's Flag and reinstated the accounts involved.
